Maze

Get ready to become a hero in our OpenGL maze game, filled with challenging puzzles, dangerous traps, and exciting adventures!

Features

Experience stunning 3D graphics, challenging puzzles, and deadly obstacles in our OpenGL maze game

Customisble Textures

Unleash your creative side and make the maze game truly your own with our customizable textures feature. From wacky and wild to sleek and stylish, the possibilities are endless!

Smooth Movements

Say goodbye to clunky movements and hello to seamless navigation with our OpenGL maze game's smooth movements. Get ready to glide through the twists and turns of the maze with ease!

Rooms With Doors

Explore a whole new dimension of challenge and excitement with our OpenGL maze game's rooms with doors feature. Will you find the key to unlock the door and advance to the next level? Only one way to find out!

About

Welcome to Library Assault, a 3D FPS game where you must fight your way through a library overrun with enemy forces. As the sole defender of the library, you'll face a range of challenges as you battle through multiple maps filled with different enemy types. Use your skills and weapons to eliminate your foes and defend the library at all costs. Library Assault was developed with passion and dedication by a solo developer who is passionate about 3D FPS games. Every aspect of the game, from the graphics to the gameplay mechanics, was carefully crafted by one person to create an immersive and exciting experience for players. With stunning sound effects and multiple maps to explore, Library Assault offers an unforgettable gaming experience that will keep you coming back for more. Are you ready to take on the challenge and defend the library?
